LanguageData.MMTank_R-wolf.label: Red wolf
LanguageData.MMTank_R-wolf.description: A tank created by a famous company.\nAfter the former rider die of untimely, he carried out the revenge and then went wild.\nIn his spare time, He is searching for iron scraps and components around with a super metal detector that does not cool.
LanguageData.MMTank_R-wolf.tools.0.label: Metal blade
